com.javaweb

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javaweb.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Model.java

    It is class of business logic. It makes game "Guess the number". Main functions is to create correct limits, to generate pseudo-random number and to verify it with input value.

    Version:
    1.0 29 Oct 2016
    Author:
    Andrii Chernysh {itcherry97@gmail.com}

        Default constructor. It generates number and limits using const values from interface Const.

      int max)
        Constructor with parameters. It generates number and limits using input values from console.

        min - minimum limit for generating number
        max - maximum limit for generating number

      • getRandomNumber

        int getRandomNumber(int min,
                    int max)
        This method generates random number in specific diapason It has package visibility, because somebody can use it in the future
        Parameters:
        min - lower limit of our diapason
        max - upper limit of our diapason
        Returns:
        random number from diapason

      • getRandomNumber

        int getRandomNumber()
        This method generates random number in diapason, which we make using our constants from Const interface It has package visibility, because somebody can use it in the future
        Returns:
        random number from diapason

      • isCorrectNumber

        boolean isCorrectNumber(int inputNumber)
        Most important method in Model class. It check our diapason limits and says is it our guess number or not
        Parameters:
        inputNumber - is player number from console
        Returns:
        is it correct number or not
